      This method is used to add the value for the initial pace based on bpm The method needs additional work to allow for values in a range rather than specific values
      static void decPrefPace()
      This method increases the preferred pace by 0.5 Check if the user default is km or m, default database value is in m Convert from km to m if needed Identify which track object is current Then it changes the defaultPace value for that track The new value then needs to be written back to the database NOT YET WRITTEN

      static void incPrefPace()
      This method decreases the preferred pace by 0.5 It needs to identify which track object is current Then it changes the defaultPace value for that track The new value then needs to be written back to the database NOT YET WRITTEN

      • addTrack

        public void addTrack(java.lang.Integer msId,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String artist)
        Method to add a track to the database
        Parameters:
        msId - Integer of the mediastore db id of the track
        title - String of the track title
        artist - String of the artist name

      • addTracks

        public void addTracks()
        Method to read the device's media db and add metadata from it to our database

      • addBpmPace

        public void addBpmPace(int bpm,
              double preferredPace,
              int trackId)
        Method to add the BPM and initial PreferredPace data for a track BPM is calculated in a separate class
        Parameters:
        bpm - Integer that is the autocalculated BPM for a track
        preferredPace - Double that is the preferred pace that this track should be used for
        trackId - Integer that is the unique reference to the track in the device's media store db

      • getAppropriateSongs

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataModel> getAppropriateSongs(double preferredPace)
        Get all tracks for a given pace and return ArrayList called appropriateSongs This needs to be modified to allow for the contentURI or the filepath of the tracks to be returned
        Parameters:
        preferredPace - Double that is the preferred pace that this track should be used for
        Returns:
        appropriateSongs An array list of the meta data about the tracks to be played

      • updateTable

        public void updateTable()
        Update database method yet to be implemented, this needs to look for changes in the audio db and replicate to this db. Changes must not overwrite existing records.

      • deleteTrack

        public void deleteTrack()
        Method to delete records method yet to be implemented

      • decPrefPace

        public static void decPrefPace()
        This method increases the preferred pace by 0.5 Check if the user default is km or m, default database value is in m Convert from km to m if needed Identify which track object is current Then it changes the defaultPace value for that track The new value then needs to be written back to the database NOT YET WRITTEN

      • incPrefPace

        public static void incPrefPace()
        This method decreases the preferred pace by 0.5 It needs to identify which track object is current Then it changes the defaultPace value for that track The new value then needs to be written back to the database NOT YET WRITTEN

      • calcPaceForBpm

        public double calcPaceForBpm(int bpm)
        This method is used to add the value for the initial pace based on bpm The method needs additional work to allow for values in a range rather than specific values
        Parameters:
        bpm - Integer that is the autocalculated BPM for a track
        Returns:
        prefPace Double that is the preferred pace that this track should be used for
